availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Sanford Hooper (Caldwell County, Kentucky, student and farmhand)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, student and farmhand. Kentucky native. Son of Enoch B. Hooper and Margaret A. Hooper. Student in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmhand in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 356A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 32.
"Charles Sanford Hooper (1842-1906)," Find A Grave, Memorial #180550693, accessed June 15, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/180550693.
